definition: in order to/so as to
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)

sentences.english: Remove spring clip securing bulb to fog lamp .
sentences.chinese: 拆卸用以固定燈泡至霧燈的彈簧夾子。

sentences.english: Here are few examples to illustrate this principle .
sentences.chinese: 略舉數例，用以說明這一原理。

sentences.english: Breadcrumbs are an indication of the customer’s location within your site.
sentences.chinese: 當前位置導航欄是用以指示客戶在網站中的位置。

sentences.english: These projects are named to match the corresponding package names.
sentences.chinese: 這些項目起的名字用以匹配相應的包名。

sentences.english: Drink hot soup or a large number of drinking water, with dilutes alcohol concentration.
sentences.chinese: 多喝熱湯或大量飲用開水，用以沖淡酒精的濃度。

sentences.english: THE fundamental constants of physics are the numbers that describe just how strong the forces of nature are.
sentences.chinese: 物理學的基本常數，是用以描述自然中力的強度的量。

sentences.english: Which of the following answer is correct to express the value 8 in octal number?
sentences.chinese: 下面的哪些答案可以用以表示八進制值8。

sentences.english: Some plant gums are used in the manufacture of cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 某些植物樹膠用以製造化妝品。

sentences.english: Globalisation is a catch-all to describe increased international trade.
sentences.chinese: “全球化”是個泛稱，用以描述增進了的的國際貿易。

sentences.english: The poles are to be inserted into the rings so they will be on two sides of the altar when it is carried.
sentences.chinese: 這貢要穿在壇兩旁的環子內，用以擡壇。

sentences.english: I think I would ask for a compass, which always points north, to help find direction.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲需要一個指南針，用以辨別方向。

sentences.english: Use the vendor for some hands-on training and mentoring to ramp up quickly.
sentences.chinese: 利用廠商進行一些內行培訓和諮詢，用以快速掌握。

sentences.english: The fuel tank is used to store fuel oil.
Preparation and Property of Desiccants Which are Made from Natural Material;
sentences.chinese: 原材料指用以生產工業品的天然物質。

sentences.english: Apraxia is a collective term used to describe impairment in carrying out purposeful movements.
sentences.chinese: 失用用以描述各種目的性運動障礙。

sentences.english: In the fourth year all its fruit will be holy, an offering of praise to the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 但第四年所結的果子全要成爲聖，用以讚美耶和華。

definition: use in/use on/use for
to be used for
with this/thereby/thus/because of this
to use for the purpose of/to serve as

in addition/moreover/(used before a disyllabic verb to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
so that/so as to/in order to
in common usage
easy to/convenient for
to borrow sth for another use/to borrow an idea for one's own use
necessary (for)/required
using this as a pretext/thereby
external part/external
special/specific/designated/particular
to draw support from/with the help of
in order to/hoping to/attempting to/waiting for
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
